item.title: Photos

item.content:encoded:
Here is a large collection of photos from the trip.  I’ve arranged them geographically rather than chronologically.  You see, I essentially circled Israel twice: once with Joe Zias and once with the New Israel Fund group.  I was in Jerusalem 3 different times, the Galilee twice, and other  places just once.  So, it seems clearer to keep related pictures together.

At some point I’ll add captions so that you have a better sense of what and whom you are seeing, and why.

Israel Photos (The gallery will open in a new browser window.)
